definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Let's go to the megastar's singing performance, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我們去聽那個天王巨星的演唱會，好嗎？

sentences.english: A: I heard you had great seats for the Three Tenors concert in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說你買到了世界三大男高音北京演唱會的好票。

sentences.english: Can you describe one of the best concerts you have ever seen?
sentences.chinese: 你可以描述一下迄今爲止你看過的最好的演唱會嗎？

sentences.english: He was scheduled to begin a series of 1550 comeback concerts in London.
sentences.chinese: 原計劃他在倫敦會進行50場的復出演唱會。

sentences.english: Choosing between a new sweater and a pair of concert tickets?
sentences.chinese: 是買件新外套還是兩張去演唱會的票？

sentences.english: I really enjoyed the Enya concert.
sentences.chinese: 我真的喜歡恩雅的演唱會。

sentences.english: It had been three years since Leehom staged a concert in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 這是力宏三年來首次在臺北舉行演唱會。

sentences.english: We go to concerts together, or out to dinner a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我們一起去看演唱會，或者經常去喫晚餐。

sentences.english: I will sing concerts at some of my fans really want to listen to the song.
sentences.chinese: 我將在演唱會上唱一些我的歌迷真正想聽的歌。

sentences.english: Relax, go to the concert, unlike many high achievers he need your support.
sentences.chinese: 放鬆一下，去看陳澤的演唱會吧，他需要你的支持。

sentences.english: We used to go to concerts and listen to rock music down there.
sentences.chinese: 我們常去聽演唱會，去那兒聽搖滾樂。

sentences.english: The concert is going to begin, the audience are waiting to enter with their tickets.
sentences.chinese: 演唱會就要開始了，觀衆們拿着票在等待以次入場。

sentences.english: He is the first Shinhwa member who holds concert in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 他是神話成員中首位在香港開演唱會的。

sentences.english: The first day show is to watch Wakin's concert.
sentences.chinese: 我們第一天的節目就是去看周華健演唱會。

sentences.english: What that means is a slate of songs handpicked by Lin for the Singapore concert.
sentences.chinese: 他想說的是他開新加坡演唱會的歌單。

sentences.english: For example if you have a friend who really wanted to go to a concert.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你有一個朋友特別想去聽一場演唱會。

definition: album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
the number of showings of a movie, play etc/screening/performance
to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
